meanings.meaning_en_US: The state or condition of physical touching.

examples.sentence: There was direct [contact] between the two surfaces.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 兩個表面之間有直接的接觸。

examples.sentence: You should maintain [contact] with your friends.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 你應該和朋友保持聯繫。

examples.sentence: Their [contact] was brief but meaningful.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們的接觸雖然短暫，但意義重大。

meanings.meaning_en_US: To get in touch with someone.

examples.sentence: Please [contact] me if you need assistance.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 如果你需要幫助，請聯繫我。

examples.sentence: I will [contact] you later this week.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我會在本週晚些時候聯繫你。

examples.sentence: Have you [contacted] the supplier yet?
examples.translation_zh_TW: 你有聯繫供應商嗎？

meanings.meaning_en_US: To press a button on a mouse or similar device, causing something to happen on a computer screen.

examples.sentence: You need to [click] on the link to continue.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 你需要點擊鏈接才能繼續

examples.sentence: Just [click] the mouse to select the option.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 只需點擊鼠標以選擇該選項

examples.sentence: She [clicked] the icon to open the program.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她點擊了圖標以打開程式

meanings.meaning_en_US: A politically organized body of people under a government.

examples.sentence: Each [state] has its own laws and regulations.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 每個州都有自己的法律和規定。

examples.sentence: The United States is made up of fifty [states].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 美國由五十個州組成。

examples.sentence: He moved to a different [state] for his job.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他因工作而搬到另一個州。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A period of 365 days (or 366 days in a leap year) starting from January 1 to December 31.

examples.sentence: This [year] has been very challenging for many people.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這一年對許多人來說非常具有挑戰性。

examples.sentence: In one [year], I plan to travel around the world.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 在一年內，我計劃環遊世界。

examples.sentence: Every [year], we celebrate the New Year with fireworks.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 每年我們都用煙火慶祝新年。

meanings.meaning_en_US: The earth, together with all of its countries, peoples, and natural features.

examples.sentence: The [world] is facing many challenges.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 世界正面臨許多挑戰。

examples.sentence: She traveled around the [world] last year.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她去年環遊了世界。

examples.sentence: He wants to make a difference in the [world].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他想在世界上有所作為。

meanings.meaning_en_US: To be engaged in physical or mental activity in order to achieve a result.

examples.sentence: She will [work] on her project tonight.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她今晚將繼續進行她的項目。

examples.sentence: He needs to [work] harder to succeed.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他需要更加努力地工作才能成功。

examples.sentence: They [work] together as a team.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們作為一個團隊一起工作。

meanings.meaning_en_US: Facts and statistics collected for reference or analysis.

examples.sentence: The [data] shows a significant increase in sales.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 數據顯示銷售量有顯著增長。

examples.sentence: Researchers need accurate [data] to draw conclusions.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 研究人員需要準確的數據來得出結論。

examples.sentence: He analyzed the [data] using statistical software.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他使用統計軟件分析了這些數據。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A group of interacting, interrelated, or interdependent elements forming a complex whole.

examples.sentence: The solar [system] includes all planets and the sun.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 太陽系包括所有行星和太陽

examples.sentence: We need to improve our management [system].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我們需要改善管理系統

examples.sentence: The [system] of government was changed last year.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 去年的政府系統改變了

meanings.meaning_en_US: A piece of writing or a message published online.

examples.sentence: I just wrote a new [post] on my blog.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我剛在我的博客上寫了一篇新帖子

examples.sentence: Make sure to read the latest [posts] from our team.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 確保閱讀我們團隊的最新帖子

examples.sentence: The [post] received many comments.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這篇帖子收到了很多評論

meanings.meaning_en_US: To send (a letter or parcel) via the postal system.

examples.sentence: Don't forget to [post] the letter.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 別忘了寄出這封信

examples.sentence: She will [post] the package tomorrow.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她明天會寄出包裹

examples.sentence: I need to [post] these documents to the office.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我需要把這些文件寄到辦公室

meanings.meaning_en_US: A course or principle of action adopted or proposed by an organization or individual.

examples.sentence: The company has a strict [policy] on employee conduct.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 該公司對員工行為有嚴格的政策

examples.sentence: Her [policy] on reporting incidents has improved workplace safety.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她對報告事件的政策改善了工作場所的安全性

examples.sentence: The government is reviewing its immigration [policy].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 政府正在審查其移民政策

meanings.meaning_en_US: Of the kind specified or mentioned.

examples.sentence: He has never seen [such] a beautiful place.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他從來沒有見過如此美麗的地方。

examples.sentence: They don’t have [such] options available.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們沒有這樣的選擇。

examples.sentence: I've never met [such] interesting people.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我從未見過如此有趣的人。

meanings.meaning_en_US: Ready for use or accessible.

examples.sentence: The information is [available] online.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 該資訊在網上可用。

examples.sentence: Is there a room [available] for tonight?
examples.translation_zh_TW: 今晚有空房間嗎？

examples.sentence: He is not [available] for the meeting.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他無法參加會議。

meanings.meaning_en_US: To provide assistance or help to someone or something.

examples.sentence: We all came together to [support] the charity event.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我們齊心協力支持慈善活動

examples.sentence: Can you [support] me in this project?
examples.translation_zh_TW: 你能支持我完成這個項目嗎？

examples.sentence: Friends often [support] each other in tough times.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 朋友在艱難時期彼此支持

meanings.meaning_en_US: A communication sent from one person or group to another.

examples.sentence: I received a [message] from my friend.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我從朋友那裡收到了一條信息

examples.sentence: The [message] was clear and concise.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 信息既清晰又簡潔

examples.sentence: Can you send a [message] to her?
examples.translation_zh_TW: 你能給她發一條信息嗎？

meanings.meaning_en_US: In a good or satisfactory way.

examples.sentence: She sings very [well].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她唱得很好。

examples.sentence: He performed [well] on his exams.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他考試的表現很好。

examples.sentence: Everything is going [well] so far.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 到目前為止一切都很順利。

meanings.meaning_en_US: In or to what place or position.

examples.sentence: Do you know [where] she is?
examples.translation_zh_TW: 你知道她在哪裡嗎？

examples.sentence: This is the place [where] I grew up.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這是我長大的地方

examples.sentence: Tell me [where] I can find the book.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 告訴我我可以在哪裡找到書

meanings.meaning_en_US: To look over or examine something again.

examples.sentence: The teacher will [review] the test results tomorrow.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 老師明天將會檢視考試結果。

examples.sentence: I need to [review] my notes before the exam.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我需要在考試前重新檢視筆記。

examples.sentence: Can we [review] the proposals again?
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我們可以再檢視一下提案嗎？

meanings.meaning_en_US: A legal entity formed to conduct business.

examples.sentence: She works for a tech [company].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她在一家科技公司工作

examples.sentence: The [company] was founded in 1999.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 該公司成立於1999年

examples.sentence: Many people prefer to run their own [company].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 許多人更喜歡經營自己的公司
